Metadata.title: Keratoconus Doctor OC | 35+ Yrs, 500+ Cases
Metadata.description: Skip the 6-month university wait. Meet Dr. Bonakdar: 35+ yrs, 500+ keratoconus cases, CHOC/UCI referral source. Book this week. (714) 558-0641

Hero.headline: Meet Your Keratoconus Specialist
Hero.subheadline: Dr. Alexander Bonakdar is Orange County's leading keratoconus doctor and expert in non-surgical keratoconus treatment and vision restoration.

Bio.name: Dr. Alexander Bonakdar, O.D. - Keratoconus Specialist
Bio.p1: For over 35 years, Dr. Bonakdar has dedicated his practice as a keratoconus specialist to the "impossible" cases. While many eye doctors shy away from complex keratoconus cases, this keratoconus doctor runs toward them.
Bio.p2: He is a trusted keratoconus specialist referral source for CHOC (Children's Hospital of Orange County) and UCI Medical Center, who send him their most difficult keratoconus and post-surgical patients. His philosophy as a keratoconus doctor is simple: "If there is a way to restore vision through keratoconus treatment, we will find it."
Bio.p3: What sets this keratoconus specialist apart is his commitment to staying at the forefront of scleral lens technology for keratoconus treatment. He regularly attends advanced training seminars, maintains close relationships with leading lens manufacturers, and has invested in state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment that most general optometry practices don't have. This dedication means that when you come to our keratoconus treatment practice, you're not just getting a contact lens fitting—you're getting access to the latest innovations in keratoconus care and corneal rehabilitation.

Travel.title: Why Patients Travel to See This Keratoconus Doctor
Travel.description: Many of our keratoconus patients have been to multiple eye doctors before finding our keratoconus specialist. They've been told their corneas are "too irregular," that they need a transplant, or that "nothing more can be done." Dr. Bonakdar, as a keratoconus specialist, excels in these exact cases. His expertise in advanced scleral lens designs for keratoconus treatment, combined with cutting-edge topography mapping, allows him to achieve successful fits in situations where other keratoconus doctors have failed. Patients from across California—and even out of state—seek his keratoconus treatment because they know that if there's a non-surgical solution, this keratoconus specialist will find it.

CTA.title: Why Trust Any Other Keratoconus Doctor?
CTA.description: Your vision is too important to risk. Schedule a consultation with a true keratoconus specialist.
